name: Sheriff VR - Cardboard
description:
VR Western game where you are feeling yourself like the real Sheriff of the West.


We were told that a gang of armed robbers plans to attack the train. As you are the best sheriff of the West, you have to stop them.
The gang has 4 bosses. Kill them to prevent the robbery! You will get an award for each death.

Just download the Game and place your iPhone in the cardboard. Special mode for iPad is available.

Features:
- Full 3D immersion
- Realistic 3D sounds
- Captivating soundtrack
- Incredible graphics that create a feel of palpable reality
- Easy to use control
- Compatible with Google Cardboard and other VR headsets with click support
- Not supporting game-pad in this version.
